projects.title: GAN-Website-Generator
projects.summary: AI tool for UI/UX designers to generate website templates
projects.description: A tool which aids UI/UX designers. Using GAN, new images of websites as templates are generated shortening the time for conception of the web design. Final year project.
projects.how_to_use:
1. Install dependencies with pip install -r requirements.txt
2. Run the training script with python train.py
3. Generate new designs with python generate.py

projects.title: Video Conference Summarizer
projects.summary: Automated tool for extractive summarization of video conferences
projects.description: A completely automated tool which performs extractive summarization on audio of Video conferences and broadcasts the summary to the intended recipient list; all at the click of a button.
projects.how_to_use:
1. Set up SMTP credentials in config.json
2. Run the application with python main.py
3. Upload video file or provide video URL
4. Select recipients and click 'Summarize'

projects.title: E-Performance Analyzer
projects.summary: Portal for assessing student potential based on holistic performance
projects.description: A DBMS course mini-project that provides a portal for students to assess overall potential based on academic and co-curricular performance and computes a metric True Potential.
projects.how_to_use:
1. Set up database with python setup_db.py
2. Run Flask server with python app.py
3. Access portal at localhost:5000
4. Enter academic and co-curricular data
